message.raw:
Initial test of device_properties BLACS_tab widgets for the PylonCamera device.

This requires PR #__ from BLACS to work.

This demonstrates how to implement device_property controls in the BLACS tab of
a device. The IMAQdxCamera tab makes calls to the new `create_device_properties`
and `create_property_widgets` methods with the class attribute `self.device_properties`.

The IMAQdxCamera worker now implements `program_properties` and `check_remote_values`
which set and get the attributes dictionary of the connected camera.

The PylonCamera subclass now defines two device_properties for manual control:
'ExposureTime' and 'CenterX'. These controls mirror the camera attributes dictionary entries.

The PylonCamera subclass now defines two device_properties for manual control:

message:
Initial test of device_properties BLACS_tab widgets for the PylonCamera device.

This requires PR #__ from BLACS to work.

This demonstrates how to implement device_property controls in the BLACS tab of
a device. The IMAQdxCamera tab makes calls to the new `create_device_properties`
and `create_property_widgets` methods with the class attribute `self.device_properties`.

The IMAQdxCamera worker now implements `program_properties` and `check_remote_values`
which set and get the attributes dictionary of the connected camera.

The PylonCamera subclass now defines two device_properties for manual control:
'ExposureTime' and 'CenterX'. These controls mirror the camera attributes dictionary entries.
